Reviews.Title: Wrong product
Reviews.Author: jch1956
Reviews.Content: I ordered the 12.1 mp camera to take pictures when I am outdoors however, they sent thge 10.1 mp camera not only as the original order but for the replacement one! All were returned however, I won't try to buy this again!

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1MP with a 2.4-inch preview screen
Pic Bridge ready with SD card support
4x Digital zoom, face and smile detection, red eye reduction and ant shake features
Can also be used to take video clips
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 12.1MP 2.4-Inch Screen Waterproof Dig Camera (VT026-STRAW-SOL)
